DESIGNING YOUR TEMPLATE

CREATING A GOOD-LOOKING EMAIL IS SIMPLE

Customize your template by clicking on the style editor tabs above.
Set your fonts, colors, and styles. After setting your styling is all
done you can click here in this area, delete the text, and start
adding your own awesome content.

STYLING YOUR CONTENT

MAKE YOUR EMAIL EASY TO READ

After you enter your content, highlight the text you want to style and
select the options you set in the style editor in the "_styles_" drop
down box. Want to get rid of styling on a bit of text
[http://www.mailchimp.com/kb/article/im-using-the-style-designer-and-i-cant-get-my-formatting-to-change]
, but having trouble doing it? Just use the "_remove formatting_"
button to strip the text of any formatting and reset your style.
